Package sensors.widgets

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlcoholThermometer
    A typical red alcohol style outdoor window thermometer.
    ArduinoSonarProcessingSketch  
    ArduinoThermometerProcessingSketch  
    GuageThermometer  
    SensorWidget
    Super class for all Arduino graphical widgets.
    Sonar
    A widget for visualizing the ultrasonic / ping style sensors.
    SonarStore
    SonarStore is a simple class to hold the results of an Utrasonic Ping Sensor.
    Thermometer
    A Generic Super class for any thermometer.
